calendarHeader.altShareLink: Get link to the session you are viewing
calendarHeader.altExportSession: Export the session you are exploring

thresholdConfigurator.maxLessThanMinMessage: The maximum value should be higher than {{minValue}}
thresholdConfigurator.minGreaterThanMaxMessage: The minimum value should be lower than {{maxValue}}
thresholdConfigurator.altResetButton: Reset the threshold values to default
thresholdConfigurator.sameValuesError: Can't distribute thresholds when Min and Max values are both the same.
thresholdConfigurator.invalidOrderMessage: The values should be in ascending order

notFoundPage.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

exportDataModal.title: Export data to e-mail
exportDataModal.confirmationMessage: Exported sessions will be emailed within minutes. The email may end up in your spam folder.
exportDataModal.invalidEmailMessage: Please enter a valid email address.
exportDataModal.sessionLimitMessage: You can't export more than {{limit}} sessions at a time. Use the time frame filter to chunk your exports or use our API.

calendarPage.forwardScrollButton: Move calendar page one step forward
calendarPage.backScrollButton: Move calendar page one step back

map.altDirect: Navigate to calendar view for given session
map.altLegendTile: Show the measurements legend for the map
map.altTimelapseTile: Show the timelapse for the map

copyLinkModal.altCopyLink: Copy the link to the session you are viewing

filters.mobileFixedInfo: The mobile tab displays measurements from mobile sessions. When recording mobile sessions, measurements are created, timestamped, and geolocated once per second. Average values for the duration of the session are displayed inside the session map markers. The fixed tab displays measurements from fixed sessions. When recording fixed sessions, geocoordinates are fixed to a set location. The most recent measurement is displayed inside the session map markers.
filters.profileNamesInfo: Enter a profile name or names to filter the sessions by profile name.
filters.tagNamesInfo: Enter a tag or tags to filter the sessions by tags. Tags are keywords assigned to sessions.
filters.crowdMapInfo: The CrowdMap averages together all the measurements from all the sessions listed on the sessions list and displays these averages as colored grid cells. The color of each grid cell corresponds to the average intensity of all the measurements recorded in that area. Click on a grid cell to view the underlying data.
filters.parameterInfo: The parameter field describes the broad category of environmental or physiological measurements being recorded. The AirCasting platform is device agnostic i.e. it will ingest and display data from any instrument that formats and communicates data according to our formatting and communications protocol.
filters.selectParameterDescription: The parameter field describes the broad category of environmental or physiological measurements being recorded. The AirCasting platform is device agnostic i.e. it will ingest and display data from any instrument that formats and communicates data according to our formatting and communications protocol.
filters.sensorInfo: The sensor field describes the specific make and model of the sensor that is creating measurements.
filters.selectSensorsDescription: The sensor field describes the specific make and model of the sensor that is creating measurements.
filters.indoorInfo: Outdoor sessions are recorded by instruments located outdoors. Indoor measurements are recorded by instruments located indoors. Indoor sessions do not include geocoordinates and are therefore not geolocated on the map.
filters.indoorMapInfo: Indoor sessions aren't mapped to maintain privacy.
filters.nonAirbeamIndoor: Switch to an AirBeam sensor to display results.

timelapse.readOnly: This view is read-only. You can explore the map, but interaction is limited.
